TopicTitle: How to show cursor coordinates in Orbital Map?

Articles.Content:
I can't seem to figure out how to enable the coordinates of the cursor on the currently active body in the orbital map view.

Would anyone tell me how I do that? I had them showing randomly a couple of times but every time I really needed to know where stuff was, I couldn't figure out how to turn it on
I'm pretty sure this only ever happens when you're focusing on a landed vessel
